landing.badge: Stack Sprint Hackathon 2026 ‚Äî Cloud-Native √ó AI/ML √ó Full-Stack √ó DevOps
landing.heroDescPart3: go hungry. Our AI-powered platform connects surplus food from restaurants to NGOs in under
landing.crisisSubtitle: Every day in India, enough food to feed millions is wasted while people go hungry.
landing.crisisDesc1: Restaurants, hotels, and caterers waste ~40% of food prepared daily.
landing.crisisDesc2: India has the highest number of undernourished people globally.
landing.crisisDesc3: Food waste causes massive environmental and economic damage.
landing.solutionDesc2: the nearest NGO & driver, and delivers food in
landing.solutionDesc3: ‚Äî turning India's food waste crisis into a zero-hunger movement.
landing.howItWorksSubtitle: From surplus detection to delivery ‚Äî fully automated in 4 simple steps.
landing.step1Desc: AI predicts quantity ‚Üí Restaurant confirms ‚Üí Photo uploaded ‚Üí Expiry time set
landing.step2Desc: ML model finds nearest NGO with capacity ‚Üí Assigns closest available driver in 2 minutes
landing.step3Desc: Driver navigates to restaurant ‚Üí Temperature check ‚Üí Photo proof ‚Üí Live GPS tracking
landing.step4Desc: NGO receives food ‚Üí Quality verified ‚Üí Meals served ‚Üí Impact metrics updated instantly
landing.featuresSubtitle: Enterprise-grade architecture built for scale ‚Äî from hackathon to production.
landing.featAiDesc: XGBoost ML models predict surplus food quantities before they happen, enabling proactive rescue operations.
landing.featRouteDesc: Google OR-Tools VRP solver finds optimal pickup and delivery routes, minimizing time and maximizing freshness.
landing.featGpsDesc: WebSocket-powered live tracking lets everyone monitor rescue missions from pickup to delivery.
landing.featAutoDesc: AI instantly matches surplus food with the nearest available NGO and driver for lightning-fast response.
landing.featCloudDesc: GCP Cloud Run + Kubernetes ensures 99.9% uptime with auto-scaling from 0 to 1000+ instances.
landing.featSafetyDesc: Temperature tracking, photo verification, and FSSAI-compliant quality checks at every step.
landing.scaleSubtitle: From 1 city to 100 cities ‚Äî 1 million meals per year
landing.readyDesc: Join the movement to end food waste. Every meal saved is a life touched.

footer.tagline: Ann-Sanjivani AI ‚Äî connecting restaurants, NGOs, and delivery partners in real-time.
footer.footerDesc: AI-powered platform connecting surplus food to those in need. Built by Team CoderPirate for Stack Sprint Hackathon 2026.

aiDemo.title: AI & ML Models
aiDemo.subtitle: Experience the ML models that power our platform ‚Äî surplus prediction, route optimization, and food classification.
aiDemo.modelInfo: Model: XGBoost Regressor ‚Ä¢ Features: 12 ‚Ä¢ Trained on 10K data points
aiDemo.configurePrompt: Configure parameters and hit "Predict Surplus" to see AI results
aiDemo.vrpDesc: Google OR-Tools optimizes multi-stop pickup and delivery routes for drivers, minimizing total distance and ensuring food freshness.
aiDemo.solverInfo: Solver: Google OR-Tools VRP ‚Ä¢ Algorithm: Nearest Neighbor + 2-opt
aiDemo.routePrompt: Click "Optimize Route" to run the VRP solver
aiDemo.nlpDesc: IndicBERT-powered NLP classifies food descriptions into categories, helping match food types with NGO preferences and dietary requirements.
aiDemo.nlpModelInfo: Model: IndicBERT v2 ‚Ä¢ Fine-tuned on 50K Indian food descriptions
aiDemo.autoTagged: ‚úì Auto-tagged: This food is suitable for vegetarian-preference NGOs and can be stored at room temperature for 4 hours.
